flavorText: "Follow your passion, I always say. Might as well get paid to do what you love."

foreignData.flavorText: „Folge deinem Herzen, sage ich immer. Warum sich nicht bezahlen lassen für das, was man gerne tut?"
foreignData.name: Gedungener Folterknecht
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger
{3}{B}, {T}: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl verliert 2 Lebenspunkte und zeigt dann eine zufällig bestimmte Karte aus seiner Hand offen vor.

foreignData.flavorText: "Siempre digo: sigue tu pasión. Por lo menos te pagarán por hacer lo que te gusta."
foreignData.name: Torturador contratado
foreignData.text:
Defensor.
{3}{B}, {T}: El oponente objetivo pierde 2 vidas, después muestra una carta aleatoria de su mano.

foreignData.flavorText: « Écoutez vos passions, comme je dis toujours. Autant être payé à faire ce qu'on aime. »
foreignData.name: Tortionnaire au rabais
foreignData.text:
Défenseur
{3}{B}, {T} : L'adversaire ciblé perd 2 points de vie, puis révèle au hasard une carte de sa main.

foreignData.flavorText: "Lo dico sempre: segui le tue passioni. E se ti pagano per fare quello che ti piace, ancora meglio."
foreignData.name: Torturatore Assoldato
foreignData.text:
Difensore
{3}{B}, {T}: Un avversario bersaglio perde 2 punti vita, poi rivela una carta a caso dalla sua mano.

foreignData.flavorText: 「情熱のままに生きろって俺はいつも言うんだ。好きなことをして金まで稼げるんだからいいじゃねえか。」
foreignData.name: 雇われ拷問者
foreignData.text:
防衛
{3}{B}, {T}：対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは２点のライフを失い、その後自分の手札からカードを１枚無作為に選んで公開する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: "역시 사람은 하고 싶은 일을 하면서 살아야되. 그런 김에 돈벌이까지 할 수 있으면 금상첨화지."
foreignData.name: 고용된 고문기술자
foreignData.text:
수비태세
{3}{B}, {T}: 상대 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 생명 2점을 잃고 손에 있는 카드 한 장을 무작위로 공개한다.

foreignData.flavorText: «Хорошо, когда работа тебе по душе. Занимаешься любимым делом, а тебе еще и платят!»
foreignData.name: Наемный Мучитель
foreignData.text: Защитник{3}{B}, {T}: целевой оппонент теряет 2 жизни, затем показывает случайно выбранную карту из своей руки.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我常说『跟着感觉走』。能以兴趣当工作，岂非人生一大乐事？」
foreignData.name: 雇佣刑吏
foreignData.text:
守军
{3}{B}，{T}：目标对手失去2点生命，然后从其手上随机展示一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我常說『跟著感覺走』。能以興趣當工作，豈非人生一大樂事？」
foreignData.name: 雇傭刑吏
foreignData.text:
守軍
{3}{B}，{T}：目標對手失去2點生命，然後從其手上隨機展示一張牌。

name: Hired Torturer
originalText:
Defender
{3}{B}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, then reveals a card at random from his or her hand.

rulings.text: The card stops being revealed after Hired Torturer’s ability resolves.
You can choose an opponent with no cards in hand as the target of Hired Torturer’s ability. If the target opponent has no cards in hand when the ability resolves, that player will just lose 2 life.
Each card in the opponent’s hand has an equal chance of being revealed, even if it was previously revealed because of Hired Torturer’s ability.

text:
Defender
{3}{B}, {T}: Target opponent loses 2 life, then reveals a card at random from their hand.
